body: I got the arraigned marriage vibe, both got set up she thinks its some hot dude he thinks some typical good girl then through sex they fall for each other, bur urs makes more sense

In short the woman is from a noble family but knows nothing about sex so her father hires the old guy to work as her sex teacher and to teach her about sexual education so that she will know what to do when she get's married. However the old guy is someone who took the job to turn her into his sex slave and has gotten a multitude of experience with women to make it happen. Then it just goes on and on with him making her take "lectures" in how to make a child and please her partner. Then in the end she seemingly falls for him and asks him to keep teaching her in the future.
